Changelog:
Updates:
1. Made some corrections to the Banglish layout and bangla date
2. The 'Bring on top' feature on the context menu of some words was misleading, and it will no longer be available for those words.
3. Efforts have been made to address the freezing issue upon closing the application.
4. Added the 'Disable High DPI Scaling' option to prevent font scaling on higher-resolution displays.
5. Added 'Mandatory' and 'Optional' update features.
